message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't exceed $12,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a bit more for the product. Would you be willing to go up to $13,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe we can find common ground. How about $13,000 for the product?
